items.title: American George Glezmann freed by Taliban after being detained for over 2 years
items.description: George Glezmann, a U.S. citizen who was detained by the Taliban for more than two years, has been released, according to the State Department.

items.title: Trump criticizes Fed decision to maintain interest rates
items.description: Trump's comments came hours after the Fed opted to hold interest rates steady.
